title: Fix broken search functionality
body: Users are unable to search for products, resulting in decreased user engagement. Investigate and resolve the issue.

title: Update payment gateway integration
body: Integrate the latest version of the payment gateway API to enhance transaction security and comply with regulations.

title: Implement dark mode feature
body: Add a toggle to switch between light and dark themes for better user experience, especially in low-light environments.

title: Optimize loading time on homepage
body: Reduce the loading time on the homepage by optimizing images and minimizing API calls.

title: Design new user onboarding flow
body: Create a more engaging and informative onboarding flow to help new users understand the platformâ€™s features.

title: Conduct security audit
body: Perform a comprehensive security audit to identify and patch vulnerabilities across the application.

title: Automate deployment process
body: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for automated deployments to reduce manual intervention and improve deployment efficiency.

title: Research GDPR compliance requirements
body: Investigate and document all requirements needed to ensure the application is GDPR-compliant.

title: Redesign mobile navigation
body: Simplify and improve the navigation experience for mobile users based on recent feedback.

title: Prepare demo environment
body: Set up a stable demo environment for upcoming product showcase, ensuring it mirrors the production environment.
